1.0.name: wordpress/tel-link-obfuscate
1.0.description:
This plugin will convert telephone numbers to callable links if the user is on a smartphone. If the user is not on a smartphone the telephone number is displayed in plain text. The text/link telephone number is then obfuscated to reduce the risk of spambots intercepting your number.

It is also now possible to use the shortcode0

[link_obfscate_telephone tel="???"]

and

[link_and_obfuscate_telephone_number tel="???"]

The following options are avaiable:

  • Add custom link text such as "Call Me!"
  • Turn the link feature off so that just plain telephone numbers are displayed
  • Turn the HTML_entities option on or off
  • Turn noscript on or off
  • Add a custom noscript message

This plugin is based upon and a re-write of the plugin at http://wordpress.org/extend/plu
